sentences.english: Transit vehicle routing problem with time intervals-constrained is considered.
sentences.chinese: 提出了具有时间窗的货物运输车辆路径问题。

sentences.english: We should check evidence (such as despatched records and correspondence) that the goods have been returned.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该审核货物是否被退回的证据。

sentences.english: An accurate description will help the Customs Authority of the country of destination to clear the products quickly.
sentences.chinese: 准确的货物名称有助于进口国海关快速清关。

sentences.english: She possessed herself of the unclaimed goods.
sentences.chinese: 她把那些没人认领的货物占为己有。

sentences.english: Typical goods moved are high demand, high value, perishable .
sentences.chinese: 典型的货物搬到高要求，高价值，易腐烂变质。

sentences.english: Please specify the mentioned shipment is for R9.
sentences.chinese: 请注明所提到的货物为R9是。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿的支持让航空公司拓展到货物和旅客的服务。

sentences.english: In 1767 Britain put customs duty on many goods such as tea.
sentences.chinese: 1767年，英国对许多货物征收关税，例如茶叶。

sentences.english: The stewards had stuck sticky labels on the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 乘务员已经将粘性标签粘贴在货物上了。

sentences.english: The peddler bawled his wares in the street.
sentences.chinese: 为他们卖的货物大声叫卖的人。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金额个人货物款的一个好处是它不需要确认信用度。

sentences.english: Suit of storing heavy die or other heavy goods.
sentences.chinese: 可用于存放特重型模具或货物。

sentences.english: The goods we packed in new and sound jute bags each containing about 200 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 货物是用坚固的新麻袋包装的，每袋约重200磅。

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by re-inspection.
sentences.chinese: 经再次检验发现贵方装运的货物重量短缺了。

sentences.english: The exit goods for processing shall be shipped back to China within the time limit as prescribed by the customs.
sentences.chinese: 出境加工货物应当在海关规定的期限内复运进境。

sentences.english: The government plans to slap a new tariff on imported goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府计划对进口货物征收新关锐。

definition: to load sth onto a ship etc
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
counter for the display of goods/(Tw) container (for freight transport)
